articles.title: HMV boss claims more people buying DVDs and Blu-ray - BBC.com
articles.description: Phil Halliday says HMV sales are up but figures suggest a DVD revival is not on the cards.
articles.content:
By Michael Race, Business reporter, BBC News
More shoppers are buying Blu-Ray and DVDs of movies and TV shows despite the rise in streaming platforms, the boss of HMV has claimed.
